TextEng: How, exactly, can you help me?
Pleased to meet you. My name is <FullName>.
What is my mission?
Aribeth told me I should speak to you.
Yes, yes, let's just get on with it.
How you help me?
Me pleased to meet you. Me called <FullName>.
What my mission?
Aribeth say me shoulds talk to you.
Yeah, yeah, you just gets on with it.
She said you would explain the details.
Text: 당신이 자세한 내용을 설명해줄 거라고 했어요.

TextEng: Just tell me what I need to know.
I'm still not clear on what I'm supposed to be doing.
Text: 아직도 제가 뭘 해야 하는지 명확하지 않아요.

TextEng: She say you gives me details.
Text: 그녀가 너가 나한테 자세히 말해준다고 했어.

TextEng: You just tells me what me needs to know.
Text: 너 그냥 나한테 필요한 거 말해줘.

TextEng: Me not clear on what me must do, still...
Text: 나 아직도 뭐 해야 하는지 모르겠어...

TextEng: I want to know about the other places I should search.
Text: 제가 수색해야 할 다른 장소에 대해 알고 싶어요.

TextEng: I would rather talk about something else.
I'll go now.
Me wants to know 'bout other places me searches.
Text: 나 수색할 다른 장소 알고 싶어.

TextEng: Me want ask 'bout something else.
Me go now.
Why is Luskan closed?
Tell me what you know of this city.
Text: 이 도시에 대해 아는 것을 말해주세요.

TextEng: Why do you think the cultists might be in Luskan?
Text: 왜 광신도들이 러스칸에 있을 거라고 생각하시죠?

TextEng: How do I get to the Neverwinter Wood?
What do you know about the place?
Why do you think the cultists might be there?
Text: 왜 광신도들이 그곳에 있을 거라고 생각하시죠?

TextEng: How do I get to this South Road?
What do you know about the place?
Why do you think the cultists might be there?
Text: 왜 광신도들이 그곳에 있을 거라고 생각하시죠?

TextEng: Why Luskan be closed?
What you know 'bout city?
Why you thinks cult in Luskan?
How me gets to Neverwinter Wood?
What you knows about it?
Why you thinks cult there?
How me gets to South Road?
What you knows about place?
Why you thinks cult there?
How do I reach Luskan?
How me goes to Luskan?
Would it be possible to hire help here?
Do you think there might be cult activity here?
Text: 여기에도 광신도 활동이 있을 거라고 생각하시나요?

TextEng: Me hires help, maybe?
You no think cult here?
What will you be doing while I'm searching for the cult?
Text: 제가 광신도들을 찾는 동안 당신은 뭘 할 건가요?

TextEng: How is Aribeth? Has she been well?
How does Aribeth fare?
I believe I have found some information on the cult.
Text: 광신도에 대한 정보를 좀 찾은 것 같습니다.

TextEng: What is the situation in Neverwinter?
I have questions about the region.
I'll be going.
What you do while me searches for cult?
Text: 나 광신도 찾는 동안 너 뭐 해?

TextEng: How Aribeth? She okays?
Aribeth is good?
I thinks me have information on cult.
Text: 나 광신도 정보 있는 것 같아.

TextEng: How goes stuff in Neverwinter?
Me has questions abouts region.
Me go now.
How do I get inside the tower?
I have the seal that you need.
Where do I find this Host Tower?
What do you know about the Arcane Brotherhood?
Text: 비전 결사단에 대해 뭘 알고 있죠?

TextEng: Where me find Host Tower?
What you knows 'bout Arcane Brotherhood?
How me get insides tower?
Me has seal you wants.
What?! What happened?
Do you have any idea where she might be?
Text: 그녀가 어디 있을지 아는 거 있나요?

TextEng: So what? What do I care?
Text: 그래서요? 제가 왜 신경 써야 하죠?

TextEng: I shall try to find her, if I can.
What?! What happen?
You have ideas where she be?
So? Me no care.
Me try finds her.
I'll go now.
Me go now.
How did you become a spymaster for Lord Nasher?
How you be spymasters for Lord Nasher?
You told me to ask you sometime how you met Lord Nasher.
Text: 나셰르 영주님을 어떻게 만났는지 언젠가 물어보라고 하셨잖아요.

TextEng: You say me shoulds ask how you meet Lord Nasher.
Text: 너 나한테 나셰르 영주님 어떻게 만났는지 물어보라고 했잖아.

TextEng: You had mentioned someone named Calli...
Me remembers you say name Calli...
Text: 나 기억해 너 칼리라는 이름 말했잖아...

TextEng: Now you seem uncomfortable around me. Why is that?
Text: 지금 저 주위에서 불편해 보이는데. 왜 그런가요?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I'd still like to hear the tale.
What do you mean? What could be so complicated about it?
Text: 무슨 뜻이죠? 뭐가 그렇게 복잡할 수 있죠?

TextEng: I'll ask you another time, then.
Fine. I really don't care, anyway.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me want to hear story.
What you mean? Why is so complicated?
Me ask later.
Is okay. Me no cares, anyway.
Text: 괜찮아. 나 어차피 신경 안 써.

TextEng: I didn't mean to take this path, but here I am.
Text: 이 길을 선택할 생각은 아니었지만, 여기 있네요.

TextEng: I have always had a talent for what I do.
Text: 제가 하는 일에 항상 재능이 있었어요.

TextEng: I suppose it was fate.
It seemed like a good idea at the time.
Me not mean to takes path, but here me is.
Text: 나 이 길 선택할 생각 아니었는데, 여기 있어.

TextEng: Me has great talent, me very good.
Text: 나 엄청난 재능 있어, 나 진짜 잘해.

TextEng: Me guesses it was fate.
It seem like good idea at time.
I trust you taught him a lesson.
You were a child. What could you have done?
That's horrible!
Me trust you teaches him good lesson.
Text: 나 믿어 너 그 사람한테 교훈 줬을 거야.

TextEng: You small child. You coulds do nothing.
Text: 너 어렸어. 너 아무것도 못 했어.

TextEng: Is horrible!
You murdered him? How could you?
Text: 그 사람을 죽였다고요? 어떻게 그럴 수가 있죠?

TextEng: Good. He deserved it.
What happened to you then?
You murders him? How coulds you?
Text: 너 그 사람 죽였어? 어떻게 그럴 수 있어?

TextEng: Good. He deserve.
What happen then?
I have heard of him. He was a notorious pirate.
Text: 그 사람에 대해 들었어요. 악명 높은 해적이었죠.

TextEng: I think so. You became a pirate?
Text: 그런 것 같아요. 해적이 되신 거예요?

TextEng: No, never heard of him.
Me hears of him. He big pirate man.
Text: 나 그 사람 들었어. 큰 해적이야.

TextEng: Me thinks so. You was pirate?
Text: 나 그런 것 같아. 너 해적이었어?

TextEng: No, me no hears of him.
Text: 아니, 나 그 사람 못 들었어.

TextEng: You kept a vicious pirate alive?
Sounds like a good living.
How did you feel, being a pirate?
You keeps bad pirate alive?
It sound likes good life.
How you feel, you be pirate and all?
Text: 기분 어땠어, 해적 되고 그랬을 때?

TextEng: Thank you for telling me.
I want to hear more!
That's it? Bah! What a stupid tale!
Thank the gods it's finally over!
Me say thanks for telling story.
Me wants to hear more!
Is it? Bah! Was stupid story!
Me thank gods is finally over!
No, I truly want to hear it.
If you do, I'll let you know.
Maybe I'll ask you later, then.
Of course it's boring... but I figure why not?
No, me really wants to hear.
If me bored, me lets you know.
Maybe me ask later.
Yeah, me's bored... but me think why not?
Text: 응, 나 지루해... 근데 뭐 괜찮아?

TextEng: So he captured you?
So you left Randall the Red then?
How long ago was that? You can't be that old.
Text: 얼마나 오래전이죠? 그렇게 나이 들어 보이진 않는데요.

TextEng: I have a hard time picturing Lord Nasher doing that.
Text: 나셰르 영주님이 그런 걸 했다는 게 상상이 안 가네요.

TextEng: So he capture you?
So you leaves Randall then?
Was how long ago? You nots old.
Me no picture Lord Nasher doing that.
Text: 나 나셰르 영주님이 그런 거 한 거 상상 안 돼.

TextEng: You betrayed your friend?! What kind of man are you?!
I suppose you did what you thought you had to do.
Text: 해야 한다고 생각한 걸 하신 거겠죠.

TextEng: That was incredibly stupid of you.
That was a very brave thing to do.
You betrays friend?! What kinds of man is you?!
Text: 너 친구 배신했어?! 너 무슨 사람이야?!

TextEng: Me guesses you dids what you thinks you had to do.
Text: 나 생각해 너 해야 한다고 생각한 거 한 거야.

TextEng: It was very dumb thing to do.
It was very braves thing, you did.
Text: 진짜 용감한 일이야, 네가 한 거.

TextEng: I wouldn't have betrayed him, that much I know.
Text: 저라면 그 사람을 배신하지 않았을 거예요. 그건 확실해요.

TextEng: I would have left, if I were you.
I don't know. I'm not you.
Probably not, I suppose.
Me would no betray, me knows that.
Text: 나 배신 안 했을 거야, 나 그건 알아.

TextEng: Me would leave, if me were you.
Me not know. Me not you.
Me guess not.
How did he respond to that?
What he say to that?
You... you're a prisoner, then?
Lord Nasher sounds like a fine man.
But you could have just left, if you wanted to.
Text: 하지만 원했다면 그냥 떠날 수도 있었잖아요.

TextEng: You... you is prisoner?
Lord Nasher seem like good man.
But you coulds leave, if you wants.
Text: 근데 너 원하면 떠날 수 있었잖아.

TextEng: What's wrong, Aarin?
Calli? Is that a woman?
Good grief, we haven't stumbled upon some sorry secret, have we?
Text: 세상에, 우리 안타까운 비밀을 건드린 건 아니겠죠?

TextEng: Bah. You're not going to start crying, are you?
What wrong?
Calli? Is woman?
We stumbles on some stupid secret, yeah?
Text: 우리 바보 같은 비밀 건드린 거야, 그렇지?

TextEng: Bah! You nots cry now, me hopes.
Text: 흥! 너 지금 안 울 거지, 나 바래.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Why? What happened?
Perhaps it's best if I not pry, then.
Text: 그럼 제가 캐묻지 않는 게 나을 것 같네요.

TextEng: Good enough. I don't really want to know.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Why you do that? What happen?
Maybe is better if me not pry.
Text: 나 캐묻지 않는 게 나을 것 같아.

TextEng: Is good. Me no want to know.
Don't tell me... you fell in love.
So did you capture her?
Sounds like one of those impossible romances.
No tell me... you falls in love.
So you captures her?
It sound likes impossible love.
So you captured her then?
This is a very boring story.
And what? She knew you had been there all along?
Text: 그래서요? 그녀가 당신이 계속 거기 있었다는 걸 알았다고요?

TextEng: So you captures her then?
This very boring.
And what? She knows you there whole time?
Text: 그래서? 그녀가 너 거기 계속 있었다는 거 알았어?

TextEng: You killed her?
You kills her?
But of course you didn't.
How did she react?
And you killed her? How could you?!
Text: 그리고 그녀를 죽였다고요? 어떻게 그럴 수가 있죠?!

TextEng: But of course you not do it.
And how she takes it?
You kills her? How could you?!
Text: 너 그녀 죽였어? 어떻게 그럴 수 있어?!

TextEng: That is very sad. I'm sorry.
That's the love of your life? A woman you seduced and assassinated?
Text: 그게 당신의 인생의 사랑이라고요? 유혹하고 암살한 여자가요?

TextEng: I can't believe you did that. How callous and selfish!
Text: 그런 짓을 했다니 믿을 수가 없어요. 얼마나 냉혹하고 이기적인지!

TextEng: Why did you do it?
Is very sad. Me is sorry.
That love of you life? Woman you kill?
Text: 그게 네 인생의 사랑? 네가 죽인 여자?

TextEng: Me no believe you do that. How bad and selfish!
Text: 나 믿을 수 없어 너 그런 거 했다니. 얼마나 나쁘고 이기적이야!

TextEng: Why you do that?
Actually, I agree with what you did... and I am sorry.
Text: 사실 당신이 한 일에 동의해요... 그리고 유감이에요.

TextEng: I... understand.
No, I can't understand.
Me agree with what you did... and me sorry.
Text: 나 네가 한 거 동의해... 그리고 나 미안해.

TextEng: Me... understands.
No, me no understand.
Certainly. I'd like that.
I don't know, Aarin. Perhaps.
Sorry, Aarin. I'm not interested.
But you still look uncomfortable.
Go on, out with it.
Ha! Actually, I like you better this way.
Text: 하! 사실 이런 당신이 더 좋아요.

TextEng: You needn't fear: I will always return.
Text: 걱정하지 마세요. 저는 항상 돌아올 거예요.

TextEng: Don't be so foolish.
You fear for me? That is sweet of you.
Don't make me gag. What are you getting at?
Text: 토할 것 같게 하지 마요. 무슨 말을 하려는 거예요?

TextEng: Thank you, Aarin. I shall keep it safe.
I... don't know what to say...
No. I don't want it.
Tell me 'bout caves.
Tell me about these caves.
Tell me 'bout caves again.
Me not needs know more 'bout them.
Text: 나 그것들에 대해 더 알 필요 없어.

TextEng: I don't need to know anything else about them.
Text: 그것들에 대해 더 알 필요 없어요.

TextEng: Me has questions about Port Llast.
Text: 나 라스트 항구에 대해 질문 있어.

TextEng: I have some questions about Port Llast.
Text: 라스트 항구에 대해 질문이 좀 있어요.

TextEng: You tells 'bout South Road.
Tell me of the South Road.
You tells 'bout Neverwinter Wood.
Tell me of the Neverwinter Wood.
Tell me 'bout Luskan.
Tell me of Luskan.
Me has more questions.
I have more questions.
Tell me about these caves again.
Okays.
Very well.
Me wants to talk 'bout something else.
I want to talk about something else.
What is you and Aribeth doing there?
Text: 너랑 아리베스 거기서 뭐 할 거야?

TextEng: What are you and Aribeth going to do in Luskan?
Text: 당신과 아리베스는 러스칸에서 뭘 할 건가요?

TextEng: You sure that be good idea?
Text: 너 그게 좋은 생각인 거 확실해?

TextEng: Are you sure that's a good idea?
How me gets into Host Tower?
How will I get into the Host Tower?
You be sure your friend lets me into city?
Text: 너 친구가 나 도시에 들어가게 해줄 거 확실해?

TextEng: Are you sure your friend will let me into the city?
Text: 당신 친구가 저를 도시에 들어가게 해줄 거라고 확신하나요?

TextEng: Me finds out all me can about cult in tower.
Text: 나 탑 안 광신도들에 대해 알 수 있는 거 다 알아냈어.

TextEng: I have discovered all I can about the cult in the Host Tower.
Text: 중심탑 안의 광신도들에 대해 알 수 있는 걸 다 알아냈습니다.

TextEng: <StartAction>Tell Aarin about Maugrim and Aribeth's betrayal.</Start>
<StartAction>Tell Aarin about the Words of Power.</Start>
